response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
